2016-02-23.headline: GME Quarterly Dividend Declared
2016-02-23.description: The Board declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.37 per common share payable on March 22, 2016 to shareholders of record as of the close of business on March 8, 2016

2016-03-04.headline: GME Announces the Pricing of Its $475 Million Offering of 6.75% Senior Notes Due March 15, 2021
2016-03-04.description: The offering is expected to close on March 9, 2016. Estimated net proceeds of the offering are expected to be $466 million. GameStop intends to use the net proceeds from the offering for general corporate purposes, which will likely include acquisitions and, potentially, dividends and stock buybacks.

2016-03-02.headline: Moody's Assigns Ba1 Rating to GameStop's Proposed $400M Senior Unsecured Notes
2016-03-02.description:
Moody's assigned a Ba1 rating to GameStop's proposed $400 million senior unsecured notes. There is no impact on the Ba1 Corporate Family Rating, SGL-1 Speculative Grade Liquidity rating, or the stable outlook.

"We believe the bulk of the proposed debt issuance will fund tactical acquisitions, with GameStop indicating it was in the process of acquiring two AT&T resellers with a combined total of between 450-500 locations," stated Moody's Vice President Charlie O'Shea. "These potential acquisitions are in line with our view that GameStop is prudently diversifying its business," continued O'Shea. "We believe pro forma metrics will initially weaken due to this, however will remain well within our band of tolerance for the rating."

2016-05-02.headline: Co-Founder & BOD Member Richard Fontaine Retires
2016-05-02.description: Richard, along with Dan DeMatteo and Len Riggio, founded in 1996 what would later become GameStop. He served as CEO from 1996-2002  and took on the role of chairman of the board from 2002-2008. From 2008-201 he served as executive chairman and eventually chairman international from 2010-2013. Led by Richard's entrepreneurial spirit, GameStop grew from a small, mall-based store chain into the world's largest video game specialty retailer with more than 7K stores operating in 14 countries

2016-08-02.headline: GameStop Buys 507 AT&T Stores
2016-08-02.description: GameStop flirts with diversifying from their primary industry, gaming, into the mobile phone space with their Spring Mobile subsidiary

2016-05-16.headline: Melvin Capital Files 13F, First Revealing 3,000 $GME Put Contracts
2016-05-16.description: Reporting up until 03/31/2016, this is the first 13F SEC filing containing a GameStop position. The 3k put contracts were worth ~$9.5M

2016-08-15.headline: Melvin Capital Files 13F Revealing Closed-Out $GME Position
2016-08-15.description: Reporting up until 06/30/2016, GameStop was not listed on this 13F, their only 13F filing to-date without GameStop

2016-11-14.headline: Melvin Capital Files 13F Revealing 4,000 $GME Put Contracts
2016-11-14.description: Reporting up until 09/30/2016. The 4k put contracts were worth ~$11M
